title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Dependabot documentation for IP allow lists, requiring self-hosted or larger runners for static IPs.
Updated Copilot docs: coding agent now available for trial users (removed "coming soon" note).
Added Azure Event Grid Key Identifiable pattern.
Set conditional validity checks (`fpt`/`ghes` vs others) for multiple patterns (Azure Event Hub, Canva, etc.).
Updated config SHA hashes for secret scanning data.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Dependabot documentation for IP allow lists, requiring self-hosted or larger runners for static IPs.
- Updated Copilot docs: coding agent now available for trial users (removed "coming soon" note).
- Enhanced secret scanning:
  - Added Azure Event Grid Key Identifiable pattern.
  - Set conditional validity checks (`fpt`/`ghes` vs others) for multiple patterns (Azure Event Hub, Canva, etc.).
- Updated config SHA hashes for secret scanning data.

### Title
Update docs for Dependabot IP allow lists, Copilot trial availability, and secret scanning patterns
